hero.title: Reinvent your company with an AI twin
hero.subtitle: It's not just AI. It's your collaborative, personalized, scalable, and secure AI.

problems.first: Disorderly use of personal AI puts security and consistency at risk
problems.second: Fragmented and unshared data slows down work
problems.third: No standards on the use of artificial intelligence

product.title: Empower Your Company with Its AI Twin
product.subtitle: Maverick AI creates a smarter organization, where AI works for people, helps them collaborate better, and can even speak on their behalf when necessary.

questions.whatAnswer: An AI tailored for your company: it knows your processes, adopts your communication style, and adapts to the way you work. It's like having a digital clone of your team, always ready to act.
questions.privacyAnswer: Your company data remains completely under your control, protected by advanced encryption and personalized access. Only you decide what the AI can know, remember, and share.
questions.compatibilityAnswer: No revolution, just evolution. Our system seamlessly integrates with the tools you already use — from Slack to Notion and many others. You continue to work as always, but with the power of AI by your side.

features.title: Why choose Maverick AI
features.subtitle: Create your very own artificial copy of your company's workforce thanks to an intelligent and collaborative system that improves operational and decision-making efficiency at every level.

brain.title: The AI Brain of Your Company
brain.description: We create a private AI model, trained on your documents, processes, communication style, and corporate culture. It's like having a customized Artificial Intelligence for your business — secure, accurate, and perfectly aligned with your way of working.

twin.title: An AI Twin for Every Employee
twin.description: Each collaborator has their own AI twin: an intelligent assistant that knows their tasks, habits, and communication style. It automates repetitive tasks, increases productivity, and learns over time.

communication.title: Communication
communication.description: Employees and managers can interact directly with others' AI twins: ask for updates, coordinate tasks, or know what colleagues are working on. Your twin can respond even when you're unavailable.
